name: calculate_neuronal_activity_rate
description: Calculates the neuronal activity rate based on the synaptic input rate, synaptic weight, and decay constant.

synaptic_input_rate.description: The rate of synaptic inputs per second.

synaptic_weight.description: The weight of the synaptic input, denoting its influence.

decay_constant.description: The rate at which the neuron's potential decays.
